# gux-day



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The gux-day component is how we render a day within an calendar. It should
not be used stand-alone.

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `day`      | `day`      |             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` |             | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [gux-calendar-beta](../gux-calendar-beta)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  gux-calendar-beta --> gux-day-beta
  style gux-day-beta fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
